name: GetFolderSharedLinkInfo
description:
Retrieve information for a shared link on a folder.

Use this tool to get details about a shared link for a specific folder using its ID. Useful for accessing or managing shared folder links.

parameters.name: include_shared_link_fields
parameters.description: Specify if the shared_link fields should be explicitly returned for this folder.

value_schema.description:
Explicitly request the `shared_link` fields
to be returned for this item.

parameters.name: folder_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the folder to retrieve shared link info for. It can be found in the folder URL in Box or use '0' for the root folder.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a folder.

The ID for any folder can be determined
by visiting this folder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`
the `folder_id` is `123`.

The root folder of a Box account is
always represented by the ID `0`.
